DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study describe incidence thromboembolic event relation pregnancy pregnancy puerperal period .
DOC.brief_title: Venous Thromboembolism Pregnant Puerperal Women Denmark 1995-2005
DOC.detailed_description: Venous thromboembolism ( VTE ) still cause maternal death western world . The purpose study estimate relative absolute risk VTE different gestational age pregnant woman compare non-pregnant woman . All Danish Women 15 49 year old period January 1995 December 2005 , free previous VTE current use oral contraceptive included.Non-pregnant woman control .
DOC.criteria: Danish woman 15 49 year old period January 1995 December 2005 . Free previous VTE current use oral contraceptive . Previous VTE current use oral contraceptive .
